turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I have a caramel macchiato, venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you have a milk preference for the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. wonderful. did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't want any whipped cream on it but I do want the caramel drizzle.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: to confirm, you want a venti hot caramel macchiato with 2% milk, no whipped cream but do include the drizzle of caramel.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. what starbucks should i place this order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you do it on It's located in Chestnut Hill, Philadelphia on Germantown Ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. i've found the starbucks in chestnut hill on german town ave.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is $4.50. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that'd be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the drink will be ready in 10 minutes for pick up. i've also sent the receipt to your mobile device. do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh that's perfect. No, that was it. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, you're very welcome. have a lovely day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. I will.
